name: Sebastian Lukasz Nowak
profile_summary:
As a Senior AWS Engineer with over 8 years of experience, I have a strong expertise in **AWS** cloud services, including infrastructure automation using **Terraform**, **CDK**, **ECS**, and **EKS**. My proficiency in **Data Lake** architecture, **Analytics**, and **IAM** allows me to build scalable, secure cloud solutions that ensure compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS. I have demonstrated experience in implementing **HA/DR** strategies and effective **Disaster Recovery** solutions. 

In addition, I leverage my background in **CI/CD** automation and **Cloud Consulting** to enhance the reliability and performance of applications. My collaborative approach fosters effective **Communication**, teamwork, and stakeholder engagement, ensuring alignment with customer expectations and project goals. I excel in environments requiring strong governance and security measures as part of my commitment to customer orientation and service excellence. Additionally, I possess solid foundations in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and emerging technologies which I integrate into solutions across the healthcare and financial sectors.
